author: James Martin
method: Grill or fry the gammon in a little oil and butter. Prepare the salsa by mixing together the remaining ingredients and stirring well. Serve the gammon with chips, potato wedges or vegetables and a generous spoonful of salsa on the side. Season with salt and pepper.
